name: Simplenote Dark [Revision]
description:
This style is a revision of the original style "Simplenote Dark" made by author	trds, which can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/128215/simplenote-dark

I edited it to fix some minor issues I had with it, but that's all I did. Minor edits to make it fit with what I want. I am uploading it in case trds updates the original so my edits aren't overwritten and for anyone that likes the changes I have made.
